//ALOK SHARMA

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define gx getchar
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define i64 long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define DBG(vari) cerr<<#vari<<" ==> "<<(vari)<<endl
#define inf 2000000000

typedef pair<i64,i64> pll;
typedef pair<int,int> PII;
void scan(int &x)
{
    register int c = gx();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gx());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gx())
    {
        x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;
    }
}

i64 x;string y;
int mul(){
	i64 c,e,idx;
	char a[50000];
	memset(a,'0',sizeof a);
	a[49999]='1';
	
	idx=49998;
	
	for(int i=1;;i++){
		e=i,c=0;
		for(int j=49999;j>=0;j--){
			if(j==idx){
				while(c>0){
					a[j--]=c%10+'0';
					c/=10;
					idx--;
				}
				int l=0;
				for(int k=j+1;k<50000&&l<(int)y.length();k++){
					if(a[k]==y[l]){
						l++;
					}
					else
					break;
					
				}
				
				if(l==(int)y.length())
				return e;
				break;
				
			}

			i64 v=(a[j]-'0')*x+c;
			//cout<<v<<" ";
			a[j]=v%10+'0';
			c=v/10;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
int main()
{
    //freopen("aain.txt","r",stdin);
    //freopen("out.txt","w",stdout);
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	int t,tt=1;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>x>>y;
		cout<<"Case "<<tt<<": "<<mul()<<endl;
		tt++;
	}
	return 0;     
}
